verbose_text: As initial controls, we verified that the S365D and S365E mutants of RAG2 were able to carry out mono-allelic cleavage of Igk under normal conditions and did not induce significant bi-allelic cleavage of Igk or cleavage of Igl on their own (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: RAG2 were able to carry out mono-allelic cleavage of Igk under normal conditions and did not induce significant bi-allelic cleavage of Igk or cleavage of Igl
